wisedevil.test

Class TestCaseParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • wisedevil.test.TestCaseParser

  • public class TestCaseParser
extends Object
    This class is a parser for a test case class.
    Instances of this class are immutable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestCaseParser(Class<?> c)
      Initializes a new instance of this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CleanupMethod getCleanup(Object inst)
      Returns the cleanup() method (if defined).
      SetupMethod getSetup(Object inst)
      Returns the setup() method (if defined).
      TestCaseInfo getTestCaseInfo()
      Returns the meta-information for the test case.
      Set<TestMethod> getTestMethods(Object instance)
      Returns all the public non-static methods annotated with @Test and not annotated with @Ignore, of type void and with no arguments.
      TestCase parseNew(Object inst)
      Parses and returns a new test case.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • TestCaseParser

        public TestCaseParser(Class<?> c)
               throws NullPointerException
        Initializes a new instance of this class.

    • Method Detail

      • getCleanup

        public CleanupMethod getCleanup(Object inst)
        Returns the cleanup() method (if defined).
        Parameters:
        inst - The test case instance
        Returns:
        The cleanup() method of the test case, or null if none has been defined.

      • getSetup

        public SetupMethod getSetup(Object inst)
        Returns the setup() method (if defined).
        Parameters:
        inst - The test case instance
        Returns:
        The setup() method of the test case, or null if none has been defined.

      • getTestMethods

        public Set<TestMethod> getTestMethods(Object instance)
        Returns all the public non-static methods annotated with @Test and not annotated with @Ignore, of type void and with no arguments.
        Parameters:
        instance - The test case instance to retrieve the methods for
        Returns:
        The test methods

      • getTestCaseInfo

        public TestCaseInfo getTestCaseInfo()
        Returns the meta-information for the test case.

        NOTE: multiple calls to this method on the same instance, return the same object.

        Returns:
        The meta-information for the test case

      • parseNew

        public TestCase parseNew(Object inst)
        Parses and returns a new test case.
        Parameters:
        inst - The test case instance
        Returns:
        A new TestCase instance
